      • editUniversity

        public void editUniversity(java.lang.String name,
                           java.lang.String state,
                           java.lang.String location,
                           java.lang.String control,
                           java.lang.String enrollment,
                           java.lang.String percentFemale,
                           java.lang.String satVerbal,
                           java.lang.String satMath,
                           java.lang.String cost,
                           java.lang.String percentFinAid,
                           java.lang.String percentEnrolled,
                           java.lang.String applicants,
                           java.lang.String percentAdmitted,
                           java.lang.String academicScale,
                           java.lang.String socialScale,
                           java.lang.String qualityOfLife,
                           java.lang.String[] emphases)
        Updated information for specified university to reflect the following information
        Parameters:
        name - name of university
        state - state university is located in
        location - setting the university is located in
        control - control the university is under
        enrollment - number of students that attend the university
        percentFemale - percentage of the student body that is female
        satVerbal - average verbal SAT score of student body
        satMath - average math SAT score of student body
        cost - average annual tuition
        percentFinAid - percentage of student body that receives financial aid
        percentEnrolled - percentage of applicants that receive financial aid
        applicants - average number of applicants annually
        percentAdmitted - percentage of applicants admitted annually
        academicScale - whole number between 1 and 5 indicating academic rigor of university
        socialScale - whole number between 1 and 5 indicating social scene of university
        qualityOfLife - whole number between 1 and 5 indicating quality of life at university
        emphases - up to five areas of studies which the university excels in

      • removeUniversity

        public void removeUniversity(java.lang.String name)
        Remove specified university from a students saved school list
        Parameters:
        name - name of university
